title: Shivalli
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Indian, Buffet, Take-out, Catering
description: South Indian vegetarian cuisine. South Indian food. Lunch buffet features papadums, starters with chutneys, several main dishes, and a dessert. Decor is stylishly wood panel around the walls and floor with modern wooden tables, recessed downlights and a sparkling silver chandelier. Park at the Newark Street car park just around the corner.
